name: lpc.vim
description:
LPC stands for a simple, memory-efficient language: Lars Pensj| C.

This script is already coming with Vim 6.2, but the official version may not be quite up to date.
install_details:
Put it into ~/.vim/syntax/ , or $VIM\vimfiles\syntax\ for Windows.

LPC source cannot be automatically recognized well, if you are using Vim 6.2 or above, see   :help lpc.vim   for instructions.

otherwise, you are strongly recommended to upgrade to Vim 6.3.

versions.release_notes: Thanks for Sebatian, he provided highlighting for closures.
